name: YouTube Ad Accelerator — Skip, Mute & Speed Up Ads
description: Automatically skip YouTube ads, mute them, and accelerate playback for a smoother, uninterrupted viewing experience. Optionally integrates with SponsorBlock to skip community-submitted sponsor segments, intros, outros, and other video interruptions. Lightweight, safe, and fully configurable — perfect for faster, distraction-free YouTube watching.
